name: Dinner and a Show [WIP]
description:
A very, very rough project for a  game narrative and design class. Still, the barebones of a project I would like to one day revisit exist there. The general concept is pretty cool, but the main point of this WIP was to experiment with a second-person, future tense narration form (which is honestly harder than I thought it would be), while also putting down some prototypical character designs and just introducing a narrative voice and getting familiar with putting down prose under the aforementioned guidelines.
If I ever manage to pick this back up again, loads would be subject to change.
